p: A statistical analysis of pdmH1N1 and seasonal influenza infections was next carried out. First, the morbidity rates between males and females in the 19 age groups were compared using Bonferroni's method. Tables 1 and 2 show the patient data for pdmH1N1 and seasonal influenza (2005), respectively, and the results of the statistical test are shown with p-values. For patients under 20 years of age, the M/F ratios were significantly greater than 1. This relationship was reversed for patients aged 20 to 69 years.
